sentences.sentence: Look at your work environment like an anthropologist.
sentences.translation: 像人类学家一样观察你的工作环境。

sentences.sentence: The biological anthropologist Christy Turner is an expert in the analysis of changing physical characteristics in human teeth.
sentences.translation: 生物人类学家克里斯蒂·特纳是分析人类牙齿的物理特性变化的专家。

sentences.sentence: The anthropologist Alexander Marshack has an interesting interpretation of some of the engravings made during the Upper Paleolithic.
sentences.translation: 人类学家亚历山大·马沙克对旧石器时代晚期的一些雕刻有一个有趣的解释。
